description: Situated in a picturesque medieval village with a castle in the Monferrato hills, this restaurant serves classic Piedmontese cuisine with plenty of meat options, alongside a few specialities from the chef’s native Liguria. Raw fish, Piedmontese-style fritto misto and grilled meat and vegetables are available by prior reservation.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
